Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Service is super helpful and friendly. Food is amazing. Love the interior. A wonderful gem outside the noise of the Red Light. All around top place to eat.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Really wanted to like it, but it did not live up to expectations at all.. the portion of the Indonesian plate was generous, and the flavours were good, but both the meats were severely overcooked. The rice was undercooked and grainy, and the cracker was soggy and flat.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Well priced and very authentic, tasty and spicy Indonesian food. Atmosphere very laid back and easy. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Kadijk

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Absolutely delicious food! I'm not gonna lie, I don't really have a clue what I ate on the mixed plate, (although I definitely had tofu satay - yum!!) But everything was so tasty! Our waitress was really helpful as we tried to order quite a ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: This is the first restaurant I've found that serves beef rendang and it was delicious. The flavors we're outstanding and just the right amount of spice. The amtoaphere of the restaurant was perfect you. From the ecletic open-air environment to the Bob Marley on the speakers, it felt like a beach side local gem.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Really amazing food here. Small little restaurant with big portions. We were stuffed after eating. Tunes were great and we really enjoyed ourselves. Super close to a smaller town vibe. Loved it and would recommend 10/10 times.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: I thought the restaurant was pretty soso. They have a cute interior and a nice outdoor terrace but their food is overpriced and definitely below average. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Great place, very comfortable. They have nice food, well made and tasty. I think they precook the meals, but this does not affect the quality. Friendly staff and some background music are also included.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: My favorite Indonesian caf√©/restaurant in Amsterdam. Nice prices, delicious food. You can‚Äôt reserve a table so if you want to have a dinner there try to go a bit early, sometimes is full.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Big portions but not everything was delicious. I didn‚Äôt like meat honestly but appetizers were good.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Small, but beautifully cozy space ‚Äî makes for an amazing atmosphere. The Indonesian plate was fantastic. Drinks are reasonably priced.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: I guess you could say it‚Äôs an attempt at making Indonesian food ‚Äúmore chic‚Äù, hence the food is nicely made but also not quite what you‚Äôd consider top quality Indonesian cuisine, and certainly not composed along what goes with what. The ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Amazing food, wonderful service. I really enjoyed eating in the outdoor area, it was cosy but.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Imagine walking in February's Amsterdam, it's so cold you can sell snot-sicles on the corner of the street. You enter this beautiful, authentic-looking, warm and welcoming restaurant. The people are friendly and you immediately feel ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Very small, but awesome Indonesian food with nice bar, good beers!

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Very friendly and welcoming. Good Indonesian food, reasonably priced, -all things considered. While the place was 2/3 full and service was a little slow, their hospitality made up for (most of ) it. Some local beers on tap. Restrooms on premises. I would recommend.

Name: Cafe Kadijk

Name: Cafe Kadijk

Review Text: Tasty and nicely spicy Indonesian food. Cosy setting.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: The food it's a bit overpriced in comparison to the same cuisine restaurants. The dishes are tasty and have a decent size. Service it's just okay and the beer it's not as could as supposed to be. Nothing amazing about the place nor the meal.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Very good food and friendly staff

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Its like home! Original Indonesian food. And food beers too!

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: food was great and above average, however, service was terrible. waitress was rude to greet us, and then was seen picking her teeth as she walk over to serve us. Later when we asked for the bill a hand written bill was provided with marked ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Really tasty, fresh foods - combination plates had a great mix of flavors. Nice, comfortable atmosphere and welcoming service. Our best meal in Amsterdam!

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Fantastic place! We had to go to an Indonesian  restaurant while we were in Amsterdam and I'm glad we chose cafe Kadjik. We had stayed with local people in remote areas if Sulawesi and ate the local food, including being taught how to cook ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Loved the food.  Good friendly service.  Went back later in our trip as my wife liked the meatball appetizer so much.  The Indonesian plate is a nice sampler.  Upstairs the first night was a little hot, but the waitress opened the window. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Very tasty and nice atmosphere.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: There are many claims either online or in travel guides that this is one of the top restaurants in Amsterdam. Don't be taken in by these. The food is fine,but nothing special. I've had much better Indonesian food in many different ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: FANTASTIC food and service. Girlfriend and I came here because I read a reddit recommendation, and boy did it pay off. We got the chicken and lamb satay and it. Was. Fantastic. We devoured them in no time. Definitely recommend for Indonesian food.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: A bit of the beaten track this is near the maritime museum. It is a small bar with a small number of tables on a mezzanine. One person runs the bar and table service while another is in the tiny kitchen. The menu is not extensive  but the ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Bottom line - this is a must try place, with excellent coffee as a bonus surprise! ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Great food. Spices have wonderful flavour and it's not just spicy for the sake of spiciness. Don't take the spices lightly though. Some dishes will make your mouth heat up.  The shrimp chips are also awesome.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: By far my favorite little restaurant and cafe in Amsterdam, I come here at least a few times a month. Delicious indonesian and authentic food (from ‚ÄòBea‚Äô). The personal is young and happy. Besides food also great for having drinks and Dutch (draft) beers.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: A cafe-restaurant with nice Indonesian food. I'm not an Indonesian food connoisseur but I try to eat it wherever I am in the Netherlands and the rest of the world and Cafe Kadijk is a place I keep coming since 2006. Solid-good, a bit pricey ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: If the restaurant is closed earlier than 1am, thanks to inform us in advance. Went there at 11.30pm and no food was available, and it was raining. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: De-lish. Our server was super nice and welcoming. Ordered the meatball app which was pretty good but what absolutely tickled my fancy was the Indonesia plate and chicken satay...make you say heeeeyyyy! Nice area with pleasant view of some of this city's beautiful architecture.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Really good food! You can't book so you just show up and hope they have a free spot for you, which isn't great. One of the waitresses had attitude, which wasn't great either üòí

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Amazing foood! We ordered chicken wings and Satay Amay along with the draft wheat beer. The place has Greta food and the staff was super warm and friendly.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Cozy atmosphere,  huge and delicious servings. I had the tempeh and tofu satay. My friends had the Rendang beef stew. Everything was delicious

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Very delicious. Try the Indonesian plate.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Probably the best chicken satay in Amsterdam. Awesome staff too!

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Great food, good quantity for price and nice view outside of busy Amsterdam life.  Close to many places you'd explore in the area. Food is unique, and the lamb and chicken Satay dinner plates were good.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Come in and ask to try something you haven‚Äôt had before. We had the mackerel app, for instance. Not just spicy. Plenty of heat but also loaded with flavor. The staff helpful and just plain cool. A really fun hour.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: We came here because somebody said it was the best Indonesian food he ever ate. We were with a rather large group, the place was packed so we sat outside. We were served 3 kind of meat, spicy hicken, sweet beef and spicy beef. The food was ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Great place! Food is wonderful, outside seating is cozy. Menu is great for both children and adults. Can not recommend Cafe Kadijk enough!

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: The food is really so-so, dumbed-down indonesian food, i expected much better rendang than what was served here. The soto soup was good though. All in all this doesn‚Äôt come close to being interesting enough for a second visit.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Fantastic Indonesian food!

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: I was referred here by a coworker who had visited Amsterdam in October. The night we tried to dine here, it appeared to be closed for renovations or due to some other type of work. It would have been nice if there was an update on the website letting diners know they're temporarily closed.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Great find, out of the tourist area and food and staff are fab

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: We really liked this place. They have very flavorful food and really give a good portion size for the price, not that it is incredibly affordable but still a good budget place speaking in Amsterdam sense of the word affordable

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Frist time we try Indonesian food and it was very good place, the food is delicious, the staff is nice. However it's quite small so it's better to book

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Wonderful vegetarian food. Tofu skewers were super good. Loved the peanut sauce.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Best Indonesian food I ever had. Amazing location and patio. Great beer and atmosphere.

Name: Cafe Kadijk

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Arrived at 2150 just before the kitchen closed. Friendly staff, really good food and excellent beer in this small local bar/restaurant. Definitely will return.

Name: Cafe Kadijk
Review Text: Cool and very local Indonesian caf√© located in a a really quint plein at the end of the Nieuwe Herengracht - great to watch the locals pass by. I lived around the corner for three years and I love the spot (just please respect it!).
